product_name: Turtle Fur Darjeeling Earflap Hat - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Enjoy all that winter has to offer while keeping warm in the colorful Turtle Fur Darjeeling Earflap hat. Cozy earflaps help keep you warm. Hand-knit acrylic/wool exterior is fully lined with soft polyester fleece for excellent warmth and comfort. Special buy.
short_description: Enjoy all that winter has to offer while keeping warm in the colorful Turtle Fur Darjeeling Earflap hat. Cozy earflaps help keep you warm.
